name: Revolving loans and overdrafts, Convenience credit, Extended credit
description: Revolving loans are loans that have all the following features: (i) the borrower may use or withdraw funds to a pre-approved credit limit without giving prior notice to the lender; (ii) the amount of available credit can increase and decrease as funds are borrowed and repaid; (iii) the credit may be used repeatedly; (iv) there is no obligation of regular repayment of funds. AS defined in BSI Regulation (ECB/2013/33), Part 2 of Annex II.
